job.title: Staff Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: The Staff Machine Learning Engineer will set the technical direction of their team to build and deploy machine learning solutions They will work closely with Product and Engineering partners in the development of the solutionbrbrstronguWhat You Get To Do Every Daybrustrongulli Design and test machine learning models to create highly accurate systems used in operations lili Write production quality code lili Take ownership of key components ensuring that they meet the needs of the business lili Collaborate with senior management product management and other engineers in the development of product lili Mentor team members to build the companys overall expertise lili Work to make The RealReal an innovator in the space by bringing passion and new ideas to work every day brliulstronguWhat You Bring To The Rolebrustrongulli Quantitative degree lili 5 years experience in building and evaluating machine learning amp deep learning models lili 5 years experience putting machine learning models into production lili 2 years experience designing computer vision models in a commercial setting lili Experience with big data tools Apache Beam Spark etc lili Experience with cloud technologies such as AWSGCP lili High degree of familiarity with Sklearn TensorflowKeras Pytorch lili Fluency in Python brliulThe RealReal is the worlds largest online marketplace for authenticated resale luxury goods with more than 20 million members With a rigorous authentication process overseen by experts The RealReal provides a safe and reliable platform for consumers to buy and sell their luxury items We have hundreds of inhouse gemologists horologists and brand authenticators who inspect thousands of items each day As a sustainable company we give new life to pieces by thousands of brands across numerous categoriesincluding womens and mens fashion fine jewelry and watches art and homein support of the circular economy We make selling effortless with free virtual appointments inhome pickup dropoff and direct shipping We do all of the work for consignors including authenticating using AI and machine learning to determine optimal pricing photographing and listing their items as well as handling shipping and customer service At our 13 retail locations including our eight shoppable stores customers can sell meet with our experts and receive free valuationsbrbrThe RealReal is committed to providing an equal employment opportunity regardless of race color ancestry religion sex national origin sexual orientation age citizenship marital status disability gender identity or expression or Veteran status We will consider qualified applicants for a position regardless of arrest or conviction records consistent with legal requirementsbrbr
